item.ptxt: Check the front side frame position for damage.
If the damage is limited to the front portion of the front side frame, remove the front bulkhead, the bulkhead support, the bumper beam extension bracket, and the bumper beam patch, and replace them.
Remove the upper side frame plate on the left side, then cut the [X] and [Y] positions of the front side frame and the front side backplate, and replace them.
Check the left side frame gusset position for damage.
If necessary, cut the [Y] position of the left front side backplate, and remove it with the side frame gusset and the side frame bulkhead as an assembly.
